description: React functional component that renders a 'How It Works' section with steps, icons, titles, and descriptions. It allows customization via props or defaults to a predefined process.

methods.name: HowItWorks({ steps, title = 'How it works', eyebrow = 'Simple process', subtitle = 'A straightforward path from talent discovery to successful hiring.' })
